::Slayer::

Slayer barely manages to keep his balance as Megaton sends a shockwave at him, the shots that Megaton had avoided knocking Slayer down. He growls, jumping up and recieving Ignatius's transmission.

"Lets get out of here," he says to Zoe, attempting to grab her and fly off.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 1st attack, Scattershot raised his automatic rifle, firing off twenty
> armor-piercing
> rounds at "Megaton" while laughing hysterically.
> 
> 
> 
> Megaton watched as the crowd gathered in full force, he wasn't sure which
> were friendly and which were enemies until they started shooting at him. He
> curled his wings around himself deflecting the first series to strike him.
> Knowing that most projectile weapons were useless against his scaled hide he
> took most of the abuse
> 
> Groove raised his photon pistol, firing off two bolts at Megaton's torso.
> 
> Two more shots struck him from the direction of the CF. "Well now isn't this
> just wonderfull first the Maximals want a ceasefire and now they're ending
> it." He thinks assuming that it was friendly fire. This was one of the
> shortest ceasefires in Transformer history. . He could feal the abuse
> wearing on his scales so he transformed to his T-rex form shrinking down
> allowing the remaining dozen or so of Scattershots  armor piercers travell
> toward Slayer and Zoe next to him.
